list.name: Changes
list.comment:
chore: Update dependencies and refactor Ktor client setup
This commit updates several core dependencies and refactors the Ktor client implementation in the `data:api` module.
Key changes include: * Updates Kotlin Gradle Plugin to `2.2.20` and JUnit Jupiter to `6.0.0`. * Adds new version catalog entries for Ktor OkHttp and JSON serialization (`3.3.1`). * Standardizes Ktor dependency aliases for consistency (e.g., `ktor-client-auth` to `ktorClientAuth`).
Module-specific changes: * **`data:api`**: Replaces the Ktor CIO engine with OkHttp (`ktorClientOkhttp`) and explicitly adds the JSON serialization dependency (`ktorSerializationKotlinxJson`). * **`list`**: Removes an obsolete, hardcoded `junit-platform-launcher` dependency. * **`romtools`**: Replaces the deprecated `material-icons-extended` with the `material3` dependency.

task.summary:
chore: Update dependencies and refactor Ktor client setup
This commit updates several core dependencies and refactors the Ktor client implementation in the `data:api` module.
Key changes include: * Updates Kotlin Gradle Plugin to `2.2.20` and JUnit Jupiter to `6.0.0`. * Adds new version catalog entries for Ktor OkHttp and JSON serialization (`3.3.1`). * Standardizes Ktor dependency aliases for consistency (e.g., `ktor-client-auth` to `ktorClientAuth`).
Module-specific changes: * **`data:api`**: Replaces the Ktor CIO engine with OkHttp (`ktorClientOkhttp`) and explicitly adds the JSON serialization dependency (`ktorSerializationKotlinxJson`). * **`list`**: Removes an obsolete, hardcoded `junit-platform-launcher` dependency. * **`romtools`**: Replaces the deprecated `material-icons-extended` with the `material3` dependency.

MESSAGE.value:
``` chore: Update dependencies and refactor Ktor client implementation
This commit updates several key dependencies to their latest versions and refactors the Ktor client setup in the `data:api` module.
**Dependency Updates:** - `kotlinGradlePlugin`: `2.1.20` -> `2.2.20` - `junitJupiter`: `5.13.4` -> `6.0.0` - Adds new Ktor dependencies: `ktor-client-okhttp` and `ktor-serialization-kotlinx-json`, both version `3.3.1`.
**Build & Module Changes:** - **`data/api`**: - Replaces the `ktor-client-cio` engine with `ktor-client-okhttp`. - Explicitly adds `ktor-serialization-kotlinx-json` for content negotiation. - Updates Ktor dependency aliases to use camelCase for consistency. - **`list`**: - Removes a hardcoded JUnit platform launcher version in favor of the catalog-managed version. - **`romtools`**: - Replaces the direct `material-icons-extended` dependency with `androidx.compose.material3`.

chore: Update dependencies and refactor Ktor client setup
This commit updates several core dependencies and refactors the Ktor client implementation in the `data:api` module.
Key changes include: * Updates Kotlin Gradle Plugin to `2.2.20` and JUnit Jupiter to `6.0.0`. * Adds new version catalog entries for Ktor OkHttp and JSON serialization (`3.3.1`). * Standardizes Ktor dependency aliases for consistency (e.g., `ktor-client-auth` to `ktorClientAuth`).
Module-specific changes: * **`data:api`**: Replaces the Ktor CIO engine with OkHttp (`ktorClientOkhttp`) and explicitly adds the JSON serialization dependency (`ktorSerializationKotlinxJson`). * **`list`**: Removes an obsolete, hardcoded `junit-platform-launcher` dependency. * **`romtools`**: Replaces the deprecated `material-icons-extended` with the `material3` dependency.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
chore: Update dependencies and refactor Ktor client setup
This commit updates several core dependencies and refactors the Ktor client implementation in the `data:api` module.
Key changes include: * Updates Kotlin Gradle Plugin to `2.2.20` and JUnit Jupiter to `6.0.0`. * Adds new version catalog entries for Ktor OkHttp and JSON serialization (`3.3.1`). * Standardizes Ktor dependency aliases for consistency (e.g., `ktor-client-auth` to `ktorClientAuth`).
Module-specific changes: * **`data:api`**: Replaces the Ktor CIO engine with OkHttp (`ktorClientOkhttp`) and explicitly adds the JSON serialization dependency (`ktorSerializationKotlinxJson`). * **`list`**: Removes an obsolete, hardcoded `junit-platform-launcher` dependency. * **`romtools`**: Replaces the deprecated `material-icons-extended` with the `material3` dependency.
